channel.title: [REP+] Annoying Client error..?
channel.description:
So, I have started randomly getting these errors whenever I try to run any clients. The client I am getting this error on, is the #474 client released with Hyperion #474. I've tried everything, and cannot seem to fix this. I'm sure it is something stupid; however, there is no need to flame the topic, or freak the hell out because I cannot fix this. So, chill out. If you have an answer, please reply. If not, keep your annoying comments to your-self. Thank-you.
The Error: [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/fm2t1.png[/img]
My Client folder layout: [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/fm2t2.png[/img]
My Batch File Code: [code]@echo off cd bin java Client 1 live live highmem members english game0 pause[/code]
I truly don't understand what the error could be, everything seems to be correct. I've tried placing the batch file in the class and java folders, and changing the paths, and nothing seems to work. Like stated in the title; rep++ will be given to the person who helps, thanks!

item.title: [REP+] Annoying Client error..?
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

So, I have started randomly getting these errors whenever I try to run any clients. The client I am getting this error on, is the #474 client released with Hyperion #474.
